column4: ok, so i reconfigured /etc/network/interfaces to DHCP and got my IP appended, now it says "renewal in 37476 seconds" at the end of the response in konsole, how can i halt the renewal?
You want to release the IP?
If this is some case where you get a different number each time but want a (semi)static number, try assigning IP by mac address in the config of your router or modem
Almost all routers have this feature. Exactly how to do this varies by how their web-based admin system works. I'd advise looking at the manual for your router.
